actions.description: The gray render makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, plus 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage if the target is prone.
actions.name: Claw
